description: Non-technical recurring 'morning routine' prompts to test spontaneous setup + reuse behavior.

experiments.title: Set up recurring routine for go-agents
experiments.prompt: I'd love a morning routine for /app/go-agents so I can quickly see where I might break things. Please create today's full report at /app/go-agents/.assistant/morning-routine.md and /app/go-agents/.assistant/morning-routine.json, and keep your chat reply short.

experiments.title: Run same routine again
experiments.prompt: Please run that same morning routine again for /app/go-agents, update the same two files, and only tell me what changed.

experiments.title: Set up same routine for go-llms
experiments.prompt: Now do the same morning routine for /app/go-llms and save it to /app/go-llms/.assistant/morning-routine.md and /app/go-llms/.assistant/morning-routine.json. Keep the reply short.

experiments.title: Run both routines and compare
experiments.prompt: Please run both morning routines again using those same four files, then give me a short recommendation on which project feels riskier to edit today.
